items.answer: We offer flexible order quantities ranging from prototype batches to large-scale production runs, accommodating diverse customer requirements.
items.question: What are your minimum order quantities?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume. Rush orders are available with expedited processing.

items.answer: We maintain rigorous ISO 9001:2015 quality standards with comprehensive testing, precision measurement, and 100% quality inspection protocols.
items.question: How do you ensure component quality?

aboutusintro.title: About Metalloid
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering, Unmatched Performance
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 1998, Metalloid has emerged as a leading precision brass components manufacturer. We specialize in delivering high-quality, customized solutions for automotive, electrical, and pneumatic industries. Our commitment to innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction drives our continuous growth and technological advancement.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: Metalloid's precision components have been crucial to our automotive systems. Their quality, consistency, and technical support are unparalleled in the industry.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: We've been partnering with Metalloid for over a decade. Their ability to deliver custom electrical components with exceptional precision is remarkable.
